summary.subject: CfP: IST Special Issue on “Next-Generation Model-Based Software Engineering with Foundation Models”
summary.purpose: This special issue aims to present insights, experiences, innovations, and solutions at the intersection of model-based software engineering and foundation models.
topics_of_interest: Use of foundation models for supporting the completion of different modeling artifacts
Use of foundation models for supporting the development of domain-specific language (DSL), abstract and concrete syntax
Use of foundation models in industrial MBE systems
Use of foundation models to support software architecture and requirement engineering
Use of foundation models to support low-code development platforms
Fine-tuned models for supporting MBE, MDE, MDD, and MDA tasks
Generation of synthetic datasets for MBE using foundation models
MBE techniques to support the development of foundation models, pre-trained models, or large language models
MBE paradigms for specifying prompt engineering techniques for large language models
Systematic literature review, systematic mapping study, and multi-vocal studies on the intersection between MBE and foundation models
Empirical studies, experience reports, and surveys on the usage of foundation models for MBE systems
summary.submission_instructions: Papers should be submitted through the Editorial Manager (EM) site of IST journal: https://edu.lu/xpnxj. Reviewers can log into the platform and find the Special Issue (“VSI:Next_MBSE”) under article type selection.
